name: Joined Together (1UpCreations)
description:
This was made for GMTK Jam 2021 but I wasn't able to finish in time - life got in the way - so I decided to finish it in my spare time!

In this game, you are trying to reach the goal by jumping between platforms and avoiding all the red objects. By touching a green object, you can split in two or combine into a single being. When you have split into two beings, the left and right being are mirrored (meaning if you move left with the left being, the right will move right).

Controls:

  • Arrows to move left or right
  • Space to jump
  • Touch the green object to split or combine
  • Touch the yellow object to finish the level
  • Avoid red objects or you restart the level
